hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select com_code.code_type as common_code_type, com_code.program_constants as program_constants, lending_type.lending_type_id as lending_type_id, lending_type.org_category as org_category, (select description_${langCode} from sys_common_code where code_type = 'ORG_CATEGORY' and common_code = lending_type.org_category) as org_category_name, com_code.common_code as lending_type_code, com_code.description_${langCode} as lending_type_name, lending_type.is_apply_gst as is_apply_gst, lending_type.gst_percentage as gst_percentage, lending_type.account_code as account_code, to_char(lending_type.insert_date, '${dateFormat}') as insert_date, to_char(lending_type.update_date, '${dateFormat}') as update_date from sys_common_code com_code, sys_lending_type lending_type where com_code.code_type = 'LENDING_TYPE' and com_code.common_code <> '0000000000' and com_code.is_active = 'Y' and com_code.common_code = lending_type.lending_type(+) ${where_clause} ${order_by_clause}
